sub_fields.label: Background Image
sub_fields.name: background_image
sub_fields.instructions: This image will very likely be a user's first impression of the website. Make it count!

sub_fields.label: Subheader
sub_fields.name: subheader
sub_fields.default_value: Because it's what makes this component important.

sub_fields.label: Description
sub_fields.name: description
sub_fields.default_value: With a bit of a description.

sub_fields.label: Icon
sub_fields.name: icon
sub_fields.instructions: Enter an icon name from http://fontawesome.io/icons/. Example: "fas-flag"

sub_fields.label: Header
sub_fields.name: header
sub_fields.default_value: Provide a step by step plan.

sub_fields.label: Subheader
sub_fields.name: subheader
sub_fields.default_value: Make sure it's not too long. Just a summary of the major steps.

sub_fields.label: Description
sub_fields.name: description
sub_fields.default_value: Elaborate a little bit, with information about why this plan works.

sub_fields.label: Icon
sub_fields.name: icon
sub_fields.instructions: Enter an icon name from http://fontawesome.io/icons/. Example: "fa-flag"

sub_fields.label: Header
sub_fields.name: header
sub_fields.default_value: Give your visitors something to get excited about.

sub_fields.label: Description
sub_fields.name: description
sub_fields.default_value: With a block like this, you'll grab their attention with a headline that prompts them to take the next step. This component is best used near the middle or bottom of the page, as a way of giving the user an "in" to get started with your Call to Action.

sub_fields.label: Icon
sub_fields.name: icon
sub_fields.instructions:
Enter a FontAwesome Icon name. Supported icons can be found here: https://fontawesome.com/icons.
(Example: arrow-circle-down)

This will display at a large size to the right of the header and description.

sub_fields.label: Override Primary Button?
sub_fields.name: override
sub_fields.instructions: Enable this to override the primary Call to Action button and replace it with a custom one.

sub_fields.label: Primary Button Icon
sub_fields.name: icon
sub_fields.instructions:
Enter a FontAwesome Icon name. Supported icons can be found here: https://fontawesome.com/icons.
(Example: arrow-circle-down)

sub_fields.label: Override Secondary Button?
sub_fields.name: override
sub_fields.instructions: Enable this to override the secondary Call to Action button and replace it with a custom one.

sub_fields.label: Secondary Button Icon
sub_fields.name: icon
sub_fields.instructions:
Enter a FontAwesome Icon name. Supported icons can be found here: https://fontawesome.com/icons.
(Example: arrow-circle-down)

sub_fields.label: Header
sub_fields.name: header
sub_fields.default_value: Give your visitors something to get excited about.

sub_fields.label: Description
sub_fields.name: description
sub_fields.default_value: With a block like this, you'll grab their attention with a headline that prompts them to take the next step. This component is best used near the middle or bottom of the page, as a way of giving the user an "in" to get started with your Call to Action.

sub_fields.label: Header
sub_fields.name: header
sub_fields.default_value: Present a few options to get involved.

sub_fields.label: Description
sub_fields.name: description
sub_fields.default_value: With a block like this, you'll show them a few choices they can take to navigate through and explore the website.

sub_fields.label: Icon
sub_fields.name: icon
sub_fields.instructions:
Enter a FontAwesome Icon name. Supported icons can be found here: https://fontawesome.com/icons.
(Example: arrow-circle-down)

sub_fields.label: Companies
sub_fields.name: companies
sub_fields.instructions: Add companies who you'd like to display in the showcase.
